borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<div>The scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in an increased sense of overbearingness to the western neighbouring dwelling. and a harmful loss of outlook and daylight to both neighbouring occupiers. The development will therefore constitute unneighbourly development and is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy
D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of Barking and
Dagenham’s Local Plan 2037</p></div>

<div>The scale, siting and design of the proposed development are considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area, notably given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate.&nbsp; The proposed first floor rear extension is uncharacteristic to the surrounding context of the area and will significantly impact the design and appearance of the existing dwelling. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy D4 of the
London Plan (March 2021)</span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><b><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- </span></b><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of
Barking and Dagenham’s Local Plan 2037&nbsp;</p></div>
description: Construction of a part two storey part single storey rear extension
